futureStaking(uint256).notice: Define array to push future staking contracts to if they are ever swapped

lastMint(address).notice: Keep track of the last block a user minted at so we can prevent spam

documentation.text:
Define array to push future staking contracts to if they are ever swapped
 @dev These have to conform to the current staking interface (or at least the stake function)
Keep track of the last block a user minted at so we can prevent spam

statements.documentation: Transfer rather than Send so it reverts if balance too low
